title: Portfolio Preview Section
description:
Portfolio Homepage: Featured Projects Preview Section

Create a featured projects showcase section for the homepage that highlights 2-3 selected portfolio pieces to give visitors an immediate sense of your work.

Requirements:
- Display 2-3 featured projects in a visually appealing layout (grid or card-based design)
- Each project preview must include:
  - Thumbnail image (optimized for web, with proper aspect ratio and loading behavior)
  - Project title (clear, readable typography)
  - Brief description (2-3 sentences maximum summarizing the project)
  - Link to individual project detail page or external URL
- Add a prominent call-to-action button/link directing users to the full portfolio page (e.g., "View All Projects" or "Explore My Work")
- Ensure responsive design that works across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
- Implement hover states or interaction effects on project cards for better UX
- Consider loading performance (lazy load images, optimize file sizes)
- Maintain consistent styling with overall site design system
- Allow for easy updating of featured projects without code changes (consider making it configurable)

Technical Considerations:
- Decide on static vs dynamic content loading approach
- Plan image asset management and optimization strategy
- Ensure accessibility (alt text, keyboard navigation, screen reader support)
- Implement proper semantic HTML structure
- Test links and navigation flow to portfolio and project pages
